SELECT S.STORE_NAME, S.STORE_INFO, S.STORE_LOCATION, S.STORE_STATUS, S.STORE_TEL, S.OPEN_HOUR, S.CLOSE_HOUR, S.BREAKTIME_START, S.BREAKTIME_END, S.STORE_CLOSED, S.STORE_IMG, S.TOTAL_RATING, S.MEMBER_NO, S.STORE_NO, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOOKMARK" WHERE STORE_NO = #{storeNo}) LIKE_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*)FROM "BOOKMARK" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND STORE_NO =#{storeNo}) BOOKMARK
FROM "STORE" S WHERE STORE_NO = #{storeNo}

SELECT DISTINCT MEMBER_NAME, PROFILE_IMG, REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_RATING, REVIEW_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REVIEW__REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REVIEW__REG_DATE, REVIEW_DEL_FL, STORE_NO, MEMBER_NO FROM REVIEW JOIN "MEMBER" USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN "REVIEW_HASH" USING (REVIEW_NO) JOIN "HASH" USING (HASH_NO) WHERE STORE_NO = #{storeNo} AND REVIEW_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM UPLOAD_IMAGE WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo} ORDER BY IMAGE_ORDER
SELECT HASH_NO, REVIEW_NO, HASH_TITLE FROM REVIEW_HASH JOIN HASH USING (HASH_NO) WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
